createApplication

public android.app.Application createApplication(Method method,
                                                 AndroidManifest appManifest)
Override this method if you want to provide your own implementation of Application.

This method attempts to instantiate an application instance as specified by the AndroidManifest.xml.

Specified by:
createApplication in interface TestLifecycle
Parameters:
method - The currently-running test method.
appManifest - The application manifest.
Returns:
An instance of the Application class specified by the ApplicationManifest.xml or an instance of Application if not specified.
